title: Raising Responsible Adults
itunes:author: Guest: Jim Burns
itunes:summary: Parenting a teenager today brings many challenges. But with God's help, you can raise your teen to be a strong adult. John and Danny describe how to have hope when your teen disappoints you. Receive the book Praying the Scriptures for Your Adult Children with your gift of any amount!
